API reference¶

Pairwise tests¶

pairwise_ttests([dv, between, within, …]) Pairwise T-tests using Pandas
multicomp(pvals[, alpha, method]) Test results and p-value correction for multiple tests

Effect sizes¶

compute_effsize([dv, group, data, x, y, …]) Compute effect size from pandas dataframe or two numpy arrays.
compute_effsize_from_T(T[, nx, ny, N, eftype]) Compute effect size from pandas dataframe or two numpy arrays
convert_effsize(ef, input_type, output_type) Conversion between effect sizes

Miscellaneous¶

gzscore(x) Compute the geometric standard score of a 1D array
test_normality(*args[, alpha]) Test normality of an array.
test_homoscedasticity(*args[, alpha]) Test equality of variance.
test_dist(*args[, dist]) Anderson-Darling test for data coming from a particular distribution
